nodes.desc: The array of nodes that designates the tree structure

node-key.desc: The property of the data that represents the key of the nodes

label-key.desc: The name of the property to be used as the label for each node

control-color.desc: The Quasar Color Palette color to attribute to the selection checkboxes within each selectable node

selected-color.desc: The Quasar Color Palette color to attribute to the text of each selected node

tick-strategy.desc: The type of strategy to use for the selection of the nodes

ticked.desc: The array to hold the selected node data

expanded.desc: An array of nodes that should be expanded when the particular parent branch of the tree with those nodes is expanded.

selected.desc: The object that holds all the selected nodes

default-expand-all.desc: Allow the tree to have all its branches expanded, when first rendered

accordion.desc: Allows the tree to be set in accordion mode

filter.desc: The text value to be used to filter on

filter-method.desc: The function to use to filter the tree nodes

duration.desc: Toggle animation duration in milliseconds. Default: 300

no-nodes-label.desc: If used, overrides the standard text in Quasar (including translations), to explain when no leaf nodes are available

no-results-label.desc: If used, overrides the standard text in Quasar (including translations), to explain when no nodes are available due to filtering

update:expanded.desc: The event is triggered, when any nodes are expanded or collapsed

lazy-load.desc: Emitted when the lazy loading of nodes is finished

default.desc: Syntax: { node: String, key: String, done: Function, fail: Function }

update:ticked.desc: Emitted when any nodes are selected or unselected via a checkbox

update:selected.desc: Emitted when any nodes are selected or unselected

getNodeByKey.desc: Gets the node related to the key given

expandAll.desc: Use to expand all branches of the tree

collapseAll.desc: Use to collapse all branches of the tree

setExpanded.desc: Expands the tree at the point of the node with the key given

state.desc: Set to true, to expand the branch of the tree

isTicked.desc: Method to check if a node's checkbox is selected or not

setTicked.desc: Method to set a node's checkbox programmatically

state.desc: Set to true, to tick the checkbox
